comment: Lemma for ~ abelth . The peculiar region ` S ` , known as a _Stolz angle_ , is a teardrop-shaped subset of the closed unit ball containing ` 1 ` . Indeed, except for ` 1 ` itself, the rest of the Stolz angle is enclosed in the open unit ball. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)
